title: Gallic War 6.17 - Gods of the Gauls 1

content.question: Identify one and only one of Mercury's roles described in lines 1-2 (hunc omnium . . . arbitrantur). Write out the specific Latin word or words for that role.

frqParts.text: Identify one and only one of Mercury's roles described in lines 1-2 (hunc omnium . . . arbitrantur). Write out the specific Latin word or words for that role.
